abstract: BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company, should increase its $132 billion proposal to win over shareholders of rival Rio Tinto Group or drop the takeover bid, RBC Capital Markets said.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton, the world’s largest mining company, should increase its $132 billion proposal to win over shareholders of rival Rio Tinto Group or drop the takeover bid, RBC Capital Markets said.

headline.main: Analyst to BHP: Raise Rio Bid or Ditch It
